name: Bad Blocks
description:
Just have fun with this simple but hard to master game.

Use the arrows keys to move Left, Right, Up and Down.

You need to get the blocks:

Red Blocks = Lets you to pass over the blue blocks.

Green Blocks = Lets you to build a free movement zone (Enter Key).

Purple Blocks = Lets you to teleport yourself to an aleatory place (Space Key).
